sentences.english: The Jin Dynasty allowed for Imperial Examinations but maintained many non-Han traditions at court.

sentences.english: Li Junmin was a fairly accomplished poet towards the end of the Jin Dynasty.

sentences.english: The sculptured brick tomb at Duchangcun, Xingyang County belongs to the early or middle period of Jin Dynasty.
